Package dnl.node

Class Source

  • java.lang.Object
    • dnl.node.Node
      • dnl.node.Source
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Node>
    public class Source
extends Node
    This class models a source (origin node): vehicles spawn at this location at predetermined rates.

      • Fields inherited from class dnl.node.Node

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: Node
        Resets this Node to start a new dynamic network loading

      • addDemand

        public void addDemand​(double start_time,
                      double end_time,
                      double demand)
        This is used to add demand to the source. It is typically called in ReadNetwork when constructing the Network.

      • getTotalDemand

        public double getTotalDemand​(int start_time,
                             int end_time)
        Returns:
        the total demand that enters the network between the two times.

      • step

        public void step()
        This method is called every time step by Network.nextTimestep(). Since this is a source node, it adds the exogenous amount of demand to the network - to the appropriate CentroidConnector.
        Specified by:
        step in class Node

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Node
        This is called every time step, after Node.step() has been called for all Nodes and Links. It can be used to finish any updating work that could not occur during Node.step(). DO NOT use this to update the internal state of Links. This is used to update the state of this Node.
        Specified by:
        update in class Node

      • storeTurningProportion

        public void storeTurningProportion​(Link i,
                                   Link j,
                                   double p)
        Used to store exogenous turning proportions from input data.
        Overrides:
        storeTurningProportion in class Node

      • getTurningProp

        public double getTurningProp​(Link i,
                             Link j)
        Overrides:
        getTurningProp in class Node
        Returns:
        the proportion of vehicles turning from Link i to Link j.
